import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { getPosts } from "../services/postService"; const Posts = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); const [filter, setFilter] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const getData = async () => { try { const postData = await getPosts(); setPosts(postData); } catch (error) { console.log("Error fetching data:", error); } }; getData(); }, []); return (

{/* POSTCARDS COMPONENT */}
{posts.map((post) => (

{post.title}

))}
); }; export default Posts;
